en: Fishermen are used to using big nets to catch various fish in the sea every day, such as bream.
pinyin: Yú mín men zǎo yǐ xí guàn le měi tiān yòng dà wǎng bǔ lāo dà hǎi zhōng de gè zhǒng yú lèi, bǐ rú shuō, chāng yú.,

en: Milk tea with black sugar tastes even sweeter.
pinyin: nǎi chá jiā hēi táng gèng xiāng tián

en: I like to use black sugar to make sweet and sour pork ribs.
pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān yòng hēi táng lái zuò táng cù pái gǔ

en: Taiwan has a particularly delicious black sugar cake.
pinyin: tái wān yǒu yì zhǒng tè bié hǎo chī de hēi táng gāo
